overview: A nice body and a big dick? Check and check! Derick seems to check off all the boxes. Not only that, but he's an all-around nice guy, and a giver too! “I"m a very big pleaser and so when I have sex, I really put the focus on my partner…what feels good to me is just knowing that I"m giving someone pleasure. ” Well Derick, you are giving all of us pleasure, so no issues there!
title: Derick
